items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bravo, 1 run

items.text: back of a length, pushes back and drops to point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: good length outside off, flayed over the in-field at cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.text: fuller of a length, angling into leg, pushed down to mid-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bravo, 1 run

items.text: short of a length, defended around off
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: sliding length ball on leg, defended
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, no run

items.text: tries to nudge it away and finds short fine
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, no run

items.text: short of length outside off, punched down to mid-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, no run

items.text: fuller of a length, spinning away, defended
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, no run

items.text: backfoot punch through cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, 1 run

items.text: flat length ball, punched down to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: short of length outside off, punched to point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.preText: Kutbuddin: "of the 5 Bangladesh players playing 100 matches together, 4 batsmen did well. Something special awaited from Mortaza now."
items.text: just back of a length, advances down the ground and mows it over to the right of sightscreen after giving himself room
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, SIX runs
Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.text: defended down the pitch
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bravo, no run

items.text: full, angled into middle, heaved over deep midwicket. Powerful wrists
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bravo, SIX runs

items.text: good length, angled into middle and leg, drilled towards mid-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bravo, no run
Mahmudullah to Hope, no run

items.text: looped around middle, but shortish and enough room to shift back and slash it away through the covers
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Hope, FOUR runs

items.text: full on middle and off, driven down to long-on
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Hope, 1 run

items.preText: Stiaan: "i wish Bravo could take a page out of his brother's book, and bat a bit faster. the issue here (slow batting) is it creates a huge load of pressure on the batsmen who still needs to bat later on.. come on Bravo, put some effort into it and slog a few!!"
items.text: pitched up outside off, driven to cover
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Bravo, no run

items.text: pushed into the covers for a quick one
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Bravo, 1 run

items.text: flat and full on middle, defended back
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Hope, no run

items.text: back of a length, lots of width, slapped straight to point
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Bravo, no run

items.text: short of a length, tucked to square leg
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Bravo, 2 runs
